lines.text: Dumpty, do you ever ponder, the fragility of an egg?
[Points him with his can]
Now, cut that out.
Imagine what may happen, if were to find yourself, oh lets say. top a high wall
[Barnaby and Dumpty on top on top of a town bridge. Barnaby taps Dumpty]
You could have a great fall, and all the king's horse,
[swat Dumpty with his cane]
and all the king's men,
[Tap him again]
could never put Humpty Dumpty...
[Swat dumpty, but miss]
TOGETHER AGAIN
[Catches Dumpty by the lanyard of the factory keys, over one side of the bridge]
Please Barnaby
[Barnaby snatches the key, cause it to break lanyard and send Dumpty falling and breaking beneath the bridge, on the stone street floor]
Ah ho ho, Scat, he's all broken up, that makes two us.
[snickering wickedly]
You couldn't take us to such an awful place?
I could too, couldn't I Ron?
Are you Tom's girlfriend?
I'm his boss.
But... I think she'd rather be my girlfriend.
Right, when cats play fiddles.
[a cat playing "Here come the bride" to a newly wed plate and spoon with his fiddle]
Ha ha ha ha ha ha, what do you know, he's playing our song.
Oh, come come my dear. I offering far more than the place is worth. Even you father Could have seen that.
Mr. Barnaby, the factory is not for sale, poppa build this factory. Without it there wouldn't be any toyland.
Hmm, how true. Which makes the thought of the old factory closing down, dovelly destressing, doesn't it.
Why would we close down?
No toy orders from Santa Claus. It's all over toyland, that Tom Piper never returned from the North Pole. I even heard the goblins had him for dinner. Ha ha

[justed entered the room]
Oh really, and how did I taste?
Stay out of this Piper. And since, Santa's order is the mainstay of your business... PIPER?
Hey, how you doing

[repeatedly]
SHUT UPPA YOUR MOUTH!

[an army of goblins arrive at the town gate]
Tom, it's the goblins.
That's impossible, who lead them here?

[to the Goblins and tipping his hat]
Welcome to Toyland.
